Italy.name: Pizza Margherita
Italy.description: Classic Neapolitan pizza with simple, fresh ingredients.
instructions: Preheat oven to highest temperature with pizza stone
Spread tomato sauce, add torn mozzarella
Bake for 60-90 seconds until crust is puffed
Add fresh basil leaves and drizzle with olive oil

Italy.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
Italy.description: Creamy Roman pasta dish with eggs, cheese, and pancetta.
instructions: Whisk eggs with grated cheese and pepper
Combine hot pasta with pancetta, then mix in egg mixture
Serve immediately with extra cheese and pepper

Italy.name: Tiramisu
Italy.description: Classic Italian dessert with coffee-soaked ladyfingers.
instructions: Brew strong coffee and let cool
Make zabaglione with egg yolks and sugar
Dust with cocoa and chill 4+ hours

Italy.name: Risotto alla Milanese
Italy.description: Creamy saffron-infused risotto from Milan.
instructions: Toast rice in butter with shallots
Add warm stock gradually while stirring

Italy.name: Osso Buco
Italy.description: Milanese braised veal shanks with gremolata.

Italy.name: Minestrone
Italy.description: Hearty vegetable soup with pasta or rice.
instructions: Sauté garlic and onions in olive oil
Add chopped vegetables by cooking time
Add tomatoes and beans with their liquid
Simmer with Parmesan rind if using

Italy.name: Bruschetta
Italy.description: Toasted bread topped with fresh tomatoes and basil.
instructions: Top with diced tomatoes and torn basil
Drizzle with olive oil and salt

Italy.name: Focaccia
Italy.description: Fluffy olive oil-rich bread from Liguria.

Italy.name: Panna Cotta
Italy.description: Silky cooked cream dessert from Piedmont.
instructions: Heat cream with sugar and vanilla

Italy.name: Lasagna alla Bolognese
Italy.description: Layered pasta with rich meat sauce and béchamel.
instructions: Layer noodles with sauces and cheeses

Italy.name: Gnocchi alla Sorrentina
Italy.description: Pillowy potato dumplings baked with tomato and mozzarella.
instructions: Mix with flour and egg to form dough
Bake with tomato sauce and mozzarella

Italy.name: Ribolitta

Italy.name: Saltimbocca alla Romana

Italy.name: Arancini

instructions: Cook risotto with saffron, let cool

Italy.name: Cannoli

Roll thin and wrap around tubes

Italy.name: Pesto alla Genovese

instructions: Stream in olive oil while mixing

Italy.name: Bistecca alla Fiorentina

instructions: Finish with olive oil and rosemary

Italy.name: Polenta

Italy.name: Caponata

Italy.name: Tortellini in Brodo

instructions: Make filling with meats and cheese

Italy.name: Cacciucco
Italy.description: Tuscan seafood stew from Livorno.
instructions: Cook seafood in order of density

Italy.name: Panettone
Italy.description: Milanese Christmas sweet bread.
instructions: Make rich dough with long rise
Bake upside down to maintain shape

Italy.name: Amatriciana

Italy.name: Cotoletta alla Milanese
Italy.description: Milanese breaded veal cutlet.

Italy.name: Sfogliatella

Italy.name: Cicchetti

Japan.name: Sushi
Japan.description: Vinegared rice combined with various ingredients, primarily seafood.
instructions: Prepare sushi rice with vinegar mixture
For nigiri: form rice balls and top with fish
For maki: spread rice on nori, add fillings, and roll
Serve with wasabi and soy sauce

Japan.name: Ramen
Japan.description: Japanese noodle soup with rich broth and various toppings.
instructions: Season broth with soy sauce or miso
Assemble bowl with noodles, broth, and toppings
Add soft-boiled egg and nori last

Japan.name: Tonkatsu
instructions: Dredge in flour, egg, then panko

Japan.name: Okonomiyaki
instructions: Cook on griddle with pork topping
Add bonito flakes that 'dance' from heat

Japan.name: Takoyaki
instructions: Turn constantly with pick to form spheres

Japan.name: Soba

instructions: Serve chilled with tsuyu (for zaru soba)
Or in hot dashi broth (kake soba)

Japan.name: Udon
Japan.description: Thick wheat flour noodles in broth.

Japan.name: Yakitori

Japan.name: Sukiyaki

instructions: Cook meat with sugar and soy

Japan.name: Shabu-Shabu

instructions: Dip in ponzu or goma dare

Japan.name: Oden

Japan.name: Unagi Don

Japan.name: Fugu

instructions: May include fried fugu or nabe

Japan.name: Izakaya
Japan.description: Drinking food assortment for pub fare.

Mexico.name: Tacos al Pastor
Mexico.description: Marinated pork tacos with pineapple, a Mexican adaptation of shawarma.
instructions: Blend chilies, achiote, and pineapple juice for marinade
Grill or roast pork on vertical spit if possible
Slice thinly and serve on tortillas
Top with onions, cilantro, and pineapple

Mexico.name: Mole Poblano
Mexico.description: Complex sauce with chocolate and chilies, served with chicken.
instructions: Blend with other ingredients to make sauce
Serve chicken smothered in mole with rice and tortillas

Mexico.name: Chiles en Nogada
Mexico.description: Poblano chilies stuffed with picadillo, topped with walnut sauce and pomegranate.
instructions: Make picadillo with pork and fruits

Mexico.name: Pozole

instructions: Simmer pork with garlic and onion

Mexico.name: Cochinita Pibil

instructions: Make marinade with achiote and citrus
Bake at low temp for 4+ hours

instructions: Make sauce with tomatoes and olives

Mexico.name: Conchas

Mexico.name: Atole

Mexico.name: Michelada

India.name: Paneer Tikka Masala
India.description: Grilled paneer cubes in creamy tomato gravy with aromatic spices.
instructions: Mix yogurt, 1 tbsp ginger-garlic paste, tandoori masala, and turmeric. Marinate paneer for 1 hour.
Grill paneer in oven or pan until lightly charred.
Heat butter, sauté remaining ginger-garlic paste. Add tomato puree and cook for 10 mins.
Add cream, grilled paneer, and garam masala. Simmer for 5 mins.
Garnish with coriander. Serve with naan.

India.name: Dal Makhani
India.description: Slow-cooked black lentils and kidney beans in butter-cream sauce.
instructions: Soak dal and rajma overnight. Pressure cook with salt until soft.
Heat butter, crackle cumin. Sauté onions until golden.
Add ginger-garlic paste, tomato puree, and cook until oil separates.
Add cooked dal, simmer on low heat for 30 mins, stirring occasionally.
Stir in cream and kasuri methi. Serve with rice.

India.name: Palak Paneer
India.description: Soft paneer cubes in vibrant spinach gravy.
instructions: Blend blanched spinach, onion, and chilies into smooth paste.
Heat ghee, crackle cumin. Add spinach paste and cook for 5 mins.
Add paneer, garam masala, and salt. Simmer for 3 mins.

India.name: Chana Masala
India.description: Spicy chickpea curry with tangy tomato base.
instructions: Heat oil, sauté onions until golden. Add tomato puree and cook for 5 mins.
Add chana masala, amchur, and chickpeas. Simmer for 10 mins.
Garnish with coriander. Serve with bhatura.

India.name: Aloo Gobi
India.description: Dry curry of potatoes and cauliflower with rustic spices.
instructions: Heat oil, crackle cumin. Add turmeric and coriander powder.
Add potatoes, cook for 5 mins. Add cauliflower and salt.
Cover and cook on low heat until tender (15 mins).

India.name: Butter Chicken
India.description: Tandoori chicken in rich tomato-butter sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tandoori masala for 2 hours. Grill until charred.
Blend tomatoes, cashews, and spices into smooth paste.
Cook paste with butter, add chicken and cream. Simmer for 10 mins.

India.name: Hyderabadi Biryani
India.description: Fragrant basmati rice layered with spiced meat and saffron.
instructions: Marinate meat with yogurt, biryani masala, and fried onions for 1 hour.
Parboil rice with whole spices. Layer meat and rice in pot.
Drizzle saffron milk. Seal with dough lid. Cook on low heat for 25 mins.

India.name: Fish Curry (Goan)
India.description: Coconut-based curry with tangy tamarind and fresh fish.
instructions: Marinate fish with turmeric and salt for 10 mins. Shallow fry and set aside.
Cook coconut milk, tamarind, chili powder, and kokum for 10 mins.
Add fish, simmer for 5 mins. Serve with rice.

India.name: Chicken Chettinad
India.description: Fiery South Indian chicken curry with black pepper and coconut.
instructions: Dry roast coriander, peppercorns, and coconut. Grind to paste.
Heat oil, sauté curry leaves. Add paste and cook for 2 mins.
Add chicken and water. Simmer for 20 mins.

India.name: Keema Pav
India.description: Spiced minced meat with buttered bread rolls.
instructions: Sauté onions until brown. Add ginger-garlic paste and minced lamb.
Cook until meat browns. Add garam masala and peas. Simmer for 15 mins.
Toast pav with butter. Serve keema hot with pav.

India.name: Pani Puri
India.description: Crisp puris filled with spicy mint water and potatoes.
ingredients: 1 cup mint-coriander water (blend mint, coriander, green chili, cumin)
instructions: Poke hole in puri, stuff with potato and chickpeas.
Fill with mint water and tamarind chutney.

India.name: Vada Pav
India.description: Spicy potato fritter in a bun with chutneys.
instructions: Mix potatoes with mustard seeds, chilies, and salt. Shape into balls.
Dip in gram flour batter, deep-fry until golden.
Serve in pav with garlic chutney.

India.name: Dahi Puri
India.description: Crisp puris topped with yogurt and sweet-spicy chutneys.
instructions: Poke holes in puris. Stuff with boiled potatoes and chickpeas.
Top with yogurt, both chutneys, and sev.

India.name: Bhel Puri
India.description: Puffed rice snack with tangy tamarind and crunchy sev.
instructions: Mix puffed rice, onions, tomatoes, and chutney.
Sprinkle chaat masala and sev. Toss lightly.

India.name: Aloo Tikki
India.description: Crispy potato patties served with chutneys.
instructions: Mix potatoes, spices, and cornflour. Shape into patties.
Shallow fry until golden on both sides.

India.name: Gulab Jamun
India.description: Golden milk dumplings soaked in rose-scented syrup.
ingredients: 2 cups sugar syrup (1:1 sugar:water + cardamom + rose water)
instructions: Knead khoya, maida, and baking soda into smooth dough.
Shape into crack-free balls. Fry on low heat until golden.
Soak in warm syrup for 2 hours before serving.

India.name: Rasgulla
India.description: Spongy cottage cheese balls in light sugar syrup.
instructions: Curdle milk with lemon juice. Drain whey to make chenna (cottage cheese).
Knead chenna for 10 mins. Shape into smooth balls.
Boil sugar syrup, add balls, and cook for 15 mins covered.

India.name: Jalebi
India.description: Crispy orange coils soaked in sugar syrup.
instructions: Mix maida, yogurt, and baking soda into thick batter. Ferment for 8 hours.
Fill piping bag, squeeze spiral shapes into hot oil.
Fry until crisp, dip in warm syrup for 30 secs.

India.name: Kheer
India.description: Creamy rice pudding with nuts and cardamom.
instructions: Boil milk, add soaked rice. Simmer for 30 mins, stirring often.
Add sugar, nuts, and cardamom. Cook until thick.

India.name: Gajar Ka Halwa
India.description: Carrot pudding cooked in ghee with milk and nuts.
instructions: Sauté carrots in ghee for 10 mins. Add milk, simmer until thick.
Add sugar, cook until halwa leaves pan sides.

India.name: Naan
India.description: Leavened tandoor-baked flatbread brushed with butter.
instructions: Knead dough with flour, yogurt, sugar, and baking powder. Rest for 2 hours.
Roll into ovals, cook in hot tandoor or skillet until bubbly.

India.name: Paratha
India.description: Flaky layered flatbread cooked on griddle.
instructions: Knead stiff dough with flour, water, and salt. Rest for 15 mins.
Roll, layer with ghee, fold, and roll again.
Cook on tawa until golden spots appear.

India.name: Puri
India.description: Deep-fried puffed bread served with curries.
instructions: Knead firm dough. Roll small circles.
Fry in hot oil until they puff up.

India.name: Bhatura
India.description: Soft, fluffy deep-fried bread for chole.
instructions: Knead soft dough with all ingredients. Rest for 2 hours.
Roll into thick circles, deep-fry until golden.

India.name: Thepla
India.description: Spiced Gujarati flatbread with fenugreek.
instructions: Mix all ingredients into stiff dough. Rest for 15 mins.
Roll thin, cook on tawa with oil until crisp.

India.name: Rogan Josh (Kashmir)
India.description: Aromatic lamb curry with Kashmiri chilies and yogurt.
instructions: Brown lamb in mustard oil. Remove and set aside.
In same oil, cook spices until fragrant. Add yogurt slowly.
Return lamb, add water, and simmer for 1 hour until tender.

India.name: Dhokla (Gujarat)
India.description: Steamed savory chickpea cakes.
instructions: Mix flour, yogurt, ginger-chili paste, and sugar into batter.
Add fruit salt, pour into greased tray. Steam for 15 mins.
Temper with mustard seeds and curry leaves.

India.name: Masala Dosa (Karnataka)
India.description: Crispy rice crepe with spiced potato filling.
instructions: Spread batter thinly on hot griddle. Drizzle oil, cook until crisp.
For filling: Temper mustard seeds, chilies, and curry leaves. Add potatoes and turmeric.
Place filling on dosa, fold, and serve with coconut chutney.

India.name: Makki di Roti & Sarson da Saag (Punjab)
India.description: Cornmeal flatbread with mustard greens curry.
instructions: Boil greens, blend with spices. Simmer with cornmeal for saag.
Knead maize flour with water. Cook rotis on tawa.

India.name: Misal Pav (Maharashtra)
India.description: Spicy sprouted curry with pav and farsan.
instructions: Pressure cook sprouts with goda masala until soft.
Serve topped with farsan, onions, and lemon. Pair with pav.

India.name: Poha
India.description: Flattened rice cooked with turmeric and peanuts.
instructions: Rinse poha, drain. Sauté mustard seeds, onions, and peanuts.
Add turmeric, poha, and salt. Cook for 3 mins.

India.name: Upma
India.description: Savory semolina porridge with vegetables.
instructions: Dry roast semolina until fragrant. Set aside.
Temper mustard seeds, add veggies. Add water and salt.
Stir in semolina, cook until thick.

India.name: Idli-Sambar
India.description: Steamed rice cakes with lentil-vegetable stew.
instructions: Steam idli batter in molds for 10 mins.
Cook dal with veggies, sambar powder, and tamarind for 15 mins.

India.name: Aloo Paratha
India.description: Stuffed potato flatbread cooked with ghee.
instructions: Knead dough. Stuff with spiced potato mixture.
Roll gently, cook on tawa with ghee until golden.

India.name: Dosa
India.description: Crispy fermented rice-lentil crepe.
instructions: Spread batter thinly on hot griddle.
Drizzle oil, cook until golden and crisp.

India.name: Jeera Rice
India.description: Fragrant basmati rice tempered with cumin.
instructions: Heat ghee, temper cumin and bay leaf. Add rice, cover for 10 mins.

India.name: Vegetable Pulao
India.description: One-pot spiced rice with mixed vegetables.
instructions: Sauté whole spices in ghee. Add veggies and rice.
Add water (1:2 ratio), cook covered for 15 mins.

India.name: Lemon Rice
India.description: Tangy South Indian rice with turmeric and peanuts.
instructions: Temper mustard seeds and peanuts in oil.
Add turmeric, rice, and lemon juice. Toss gently.

India.name: Tomato Rice
India.description: Spicy tomato-infused rice with curry leaves.
instructions: Sauté ginger-garlic paste, add tomato puree and spices.
Add rice and water. Cook until done.

India.name: Coconut Rice
India.description: Aromatic rice with fresh coconut and cashews.
instructions: Cook rice. Temper mustard seeds, chilies, and cashews.
Mix with rice and coconut. Serve warm.

India.name: Masala Chai
India.description: Spiced milk tea with ginger and cardamom.
instructions: Boil water with ginger and cardamom.
Add tea leaves, then milk. Simmer for 2 mins.

India.name: Lassi
India.description: Creamy yogurt drink, sweet or salty.

India.name: Jaljeera
India.description: Tangy cumin-mint digestive drink.
instructions: Blend mint, cumin, and spices with water.
Strain and chill. Serve with ice.

India.name: Thandai
India.description: Nutty milk drink with saffron and spices.
instructions: Soak nuts and seeds for 2 hours. Blend with milk.
Strain, add saffron. Chill before serving.

India.name: Filter Coffee
India.description: Strong South Indian decoction coffee with frothy milk.
instructions: Brew coffee in filter. Mix 1/4 decoction with hot milk and sugar.
Pour between cups to create froth.

India.name: Samosa
India.description: Crispy pastry stuffed with spiced potatoes.
instructions: Knead stiff dough with flour and oil. Rest for 30 mins.
Stuff with spiced potato mixture. Shape into cones.

India.name: Kachori
India.description: Deep-fried flaky pastry with lentil filling.
instructions: Grind dal with spices into coarse paste.
Roll dough, stuff with paste, flatten. Deep-fry.

India.name: Pakora
India.description: Vegetable fritters in chickpea batter.
instructions: Mix flour, spices, and water into thick batter.

India.name: Mirchi Bajji
India.description: Stuffed chili fritters with tangy chutney.
instructions: Slit chilies, stuff with spice mix.
Dip in batter, deep-fry until golden.

India.name: Chaat Papdi
India.description: Crisp wheat crackers topped with chutneys and yogurt.
instructions: Roll dough thin, cut circles, deep-fry until crisp.
Top with yogurt, chutneys, sev, and spices.
